== About ==

Hi, I'm William Anderson (neuro), I'm a sysadmin by trade, and I'm also involved in various open source projects such as SmoothWall and OpenVAS. I've been using Ubuntu since the early days of Warty, and loved it ever since.  I also use Debian, RHEL and CentOS.

'''Launchpad''': https://launchpad.net/people/neuro

'''Web''': http://neuro.me.uk/

'''IRC''': neuro_ [freenode]

'''Email''': neuro [at] well [dot] com
